description: Découvrez les meilleurs hôtels à Anaheim, United States. Trouvez des offres exclusives et des hébergements de luxe.

hotels.title: Contemporary California Stay near Disneyland Resort
hotels.description: Soak up golden California sunshine and discover the magic of the nearby _Disneyland_ Resort and theme parks with a stay at Sonesta Anaheim Resort. Discover your home-away-from-home in bright, family-friendly rooms and suites in the heart of Orange County's buzzing Anaheim. Flop onto a sun-soaked lounger poolside and sip an ice-cold beer, or work up a sweat at the 24/7 onsite fitness centre. Don't miss a minute of the action at The Burger Place Lounge, which serves up a hearty dining menu in front of 16 large TVs showing the latest sporting games. The resort is just minutes from Anaheim's signature attractions, _Disneyland_ Resort and _Disney California Adventure Park._ Both parks are within a 30-minute walk from the resort and are accessible by the local area shuttle bus. Other attractions including Knott's Berry Farm, Buena Park, The Outlets at Orange and Santa Ana Zoo are all within driving distance.

hotels.title: Family-Friendly Disneyland Resort Grand Californian Escape near Downtown Disney with Three Pools & Spa
hotels.description: Step into the heart of the magic at _Disney’s Grand Californian Hotel & Spa_, an exclusive retreat located in _Disneyland_ Resort. With direct access to _Disney California Adventure_ and just moments from _Disneyland_ Resort and the vibrant _Downtown Disney_ District, this craftsman-style hotel immerses you in the wonder of Disney like never before. Perfect for families, the hotel offers elegantly designed rooms, ensuring a restful haven after days of adventure. Beyond the parks, the fun continues with multiple themed pools, award-winning dining options and the serene Tenaya Stone Spa, where relaxation takes centre stage.

hotels.title: Disneyland Resort Pixar Place Hotel with Early Theme Park Entry, Themed Dining & Rooftop Pool
hotels.description: Experience the magic of Disney with a stay at _Pixar Place_ Hotel, just steps from the _Disneyland_ Theme Parks in Anaheim, California. This playful property, inspired by beloved Pixar films, houses themed rooms - each one a tribute to Pixar's beloved films - three joyful eateries and bars and a rooftop pool deck with a waterslide and splash pad. Staying at _Pixar Place_ Hotel comes with exclusive perks, such as early theme park entry, fitness classes and movie nights for the whole family. When you're not immersed in the fun-filled theme parks, relax in a private poolside cabana or, for a change of pace, explore the nearby vibrant _Downtown Disney_ District, brimming with unique shops, live entertainment and diverse dining options

hotels.title: Bright Anaheim Escape Moments from Disneyland Resort & Anaheim Convention Center
hotels.description: Magic awaits with an adventure to Southern California and a stay at Hotel Indigo Anaheim, an IHG Hotel. Occupying prime position in the heart of vibrant Anaheim, you'll be just steps away from Disneyland Resort and a five-minute drive from Anaheim Convention Center. Explore the eclectic mix of eateries in the Anaheim Packing District or catch a game at Angel Stadium. Back at the hotel, unwind in the pool or savour delicious local dishes at Chambers Bar & Bistro.
